name: @neoskop/dockerfile.js
description: Write configurable, scriptable, reusable dockerfiles in Typescript or plain Javascript.
author: Mark Wecke <wecke@neoskop.de>

scripts.postbuild: cp README.md dist && cp LICENSE.md dist && cp package.json dist && cp -r bin dist/bin
scripts.publish-next: npm run build && npm publish dist --tag next
scripts.publish-latest-only: npm run build && npm publish dist
scripts.publish-latest: npm run publish-latest-only && npm dist-tag add `jq '.name' package.json -r`@`jq '.version' package.json -r` next
